conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a folklore movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.text: I'd highly recommend "The Seduction of Joe Tynan" if you're in the mood for a folklore movie with a political twist. Another interesting choice is "Psychic Experiment," which delves into the mysterious and eerie side of folklore, featuring Adrienne King and Glenn Morshower in a small, self-sufficient community with dark secrets. Enjoy your movie time!

This movie explores themes of redemption and racial prejudice as a prisoner guard falls in love with the wife of the last man he executed. Halle Berry won an Academy Award for her role in this film.
